Package display

Class Tier

java.lang.Object
display.Display
display.Tier
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrangeTier, PurpleTier, RedTier, YellowTier
public abstract class Tier
extends Display
This class represents the overall structure of a Tier, or level, in the Mask On! game
Author:
EmilyTumacder

  • Constructor Details

    • Tier

      public Tier​(double x, double y, double width, double height, int strokeWeight, java.awt.Color strokeColor, java.awt.Color fillColor)
      Set up a tier with the given values, similar to Display
      Parameters:
      x - the top left corner x value
      y - the top left corner y value
      width - tier width
      height - tier height
      strokeWeight - strokeweight of lines
      strokeColor - strokecolor of lines
      fillColor - fill color of shapes

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet marker)
      Draw the tier on the surface
      Specified by:
      draw in class Display
      Parameters:
      marker - the PApplet surface you're drawing on
      Precondition:
      this method runs with the conditions previously set on the given PApplet
